title: BANNED FOR TELLING TEAM TO SURRENDER?
body:
so today i got suspended for telling my team to surrender after someone on my team afk's i really don't understand how i get banned for telling my team to surrender while...
1. i have an afk on the team (am 99% sure they are not banned) 
2.the whole team is spam pinging me and flaming me in the chat for apparently not doing anything. now am not saying that this was my best game but at the same time i went 3/3/2 with 122 cs against a teemo that was really abusing the range difference while playing olaf and never going afk and trying to be useful by pushing out and taking the objectives i can. like what do you want me to do?

paatooss: nice feed team
paatooss: realy nice
paatooss: gg report my jg
paatooss: well what do you want me to do againts a teemo
paatooss: teemo + 0 jg = lost gmae
paatooss: game
paatooss: nice afk
paatooss: furender you idiots
paatooss: surender
paatooss: stop wasting time
paatooss: pls report jg
paatooss: gg

the one thing i will say is that maybe but a really big maybe the part where i say the report my jg and calling them idiots is a bit toxic? since i know the jg really doesn't have to come to my lane and the whole team was spam pinging me and flaming which obviously tilted me but is calling someone an idiot or saying report somone that toxic to ban me if you really that offended by me calling you an idiot then mute me 

dear riot 
              1. somehow please change the surrender system because it really is not working since there are people that will on purpose press no just so others have to suffer and waste time i mean what am i meant to do if i alt f4 am just gonna get banned so i have to play and make the game even longer for no reason since its already lost am not saying its 100%lost since there is always a chance for winning but when the main source of the teams dmg goes afk and the rest of the team are just feeding...

2.fix your banning system because this is really not working as well just looking at the chat does not work you need to add something like and overwatch form csgo with chat or something because people can just to easily ruin games without being detected for going afk since the are still moving around or just afk farming all game or even soft feeding which is also no really detectable just by chat

Thankyou.

also please unban me too

No. You got banned for calling your teammates idiots, for threatening them with reports and for overall being toxic.

If the deem the fact that you are ruining their experience intentionally, you are banned.
the player decides if they still want to play or not, if they are intentionally trying to keep people playing to suffer, its bannable.
if they want to keep playing because its fun, its not.

what are you talking about am ruining their game you can count on one hand what i have done 
1.called them idiots once 
2.said to report my jg (which if you actually read the thing you would know i already acknowledge that it might be slightly toxic but at the same time i did not spam it )
3.called them out for feeding once 
so pls explain how am ruining their game while we have an actual afk on our team  and am still playing in fact am doing the most on the team to win the game while they are spam pinging me for some reason  and once we all 4 die which was really close to the end on the game  i tell them to surrender to not waste time the only reason the game went on so long is because for some reason the other team decided to take other  objectives instead of pushing out to inhibit towers
